Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: privacy
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: The default post privacy to be used for new statuses.

Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: sensitive
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: Whether new statuses should be marked sensitive by default.

Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.name: language
Structs/TootSource.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6So.abstract: The default posting language for new statuses.

Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.name: poll
Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.abstract: A poll you have voted in or created has ended

Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.name: status
Structs/TootNotification/NotificationTyp.abstract: Someone you enabled notifications for has posted a status

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: id
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The id of the notification in the database.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: type
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The type of event that resulted in the notification.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: account
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.

Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.name: status
Structs/TootNotification.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Status that was the object of the notification, e.g. in mentions, reblogs, favourites, or polls.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: name
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: The key of a given field’s key-value pair.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: value
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: The value associated with the name key.

Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.name: verifiedAt
Structs/TootField.html#/s:7TootSDK0A5Fie.abstract: Timestamp of when the server verified a URL value for a rel=“me” link.

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: vapidKey
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Used for Push Streaming API. Returned with POST /api/v1/apps. Equivalent to PushSubscription#server_key

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: clientId
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Client ID key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: clientSecret
Structs/TootApplication.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Client secret key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: day
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: uses
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: the counted usage of the tag within that day.

Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.name: accounts
Structs/TagHistory.html#/s:7TootSDK10Tag.abstract: the total of accounts using the tag within that day.

Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV4nameSS.name: name
Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV4nameSS.abstract: The value of the hashtag after the # sign.

Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV3urlSSv.name: url
Structs/Tag.html#/s:7TootSDK3TagV3urlSSv.abstract: A link to the hashtag on the instance.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: init(status:mediaIds:poll:inReplyToId:sensitive:spoilerText:visibility:language:contentType:inReplyToConversationId:)
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: Creates an object to post a new status

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: status
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: The text content of the status. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while status is provided.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: mediaIds
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, status becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: inReplyToId
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: ID of the status being replied to, if status is a reply.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: sensitive
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: Mark status and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: spoilerText
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Statuses are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: visibility
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: Sets the visibility of the posted status to public, unlisted, private, direct.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: contentType
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: (Pleroma) The MIME type of the status, it is transformed into HTML by the backend. You can get the list of the supported MIME types with the nodeinfo endpoint.

Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.name: inReplyToConversationId
Structs/StatusParams.html#/s:7TootSDK12S.abstract: (Pleroma) Will reply to a given conversation, addressing only the people who are part of the recipient set of that conversation. Sets the visibility to direct.

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: content
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: The content of the status at this revision.

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: spoilerText
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: The content of the subject or content warning at this revision

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: sensitive
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: Whether the status was marked sensitive at this revision

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: createdAt
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: The timestamp of when the revision was published

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: poll
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: The current state of the poll options at this revision

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: mediaAttachments
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: The current state of the media attachments at this revision

Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.name: emojis
Structs/StatusEdit.html#/s:7TootSDK10Sta.abstract: Any custom emoji that are used in the current revision

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: init(text:mediaIds:sensitive:spoilerText:visibility:language:scheduledAt:poll:idempotency:inReplyToId:contentType:inReplyToConversationId:)
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: Creates parameters to post a new scheduled status

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: text
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: The text content of the status. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while status is provided.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: mediaIds
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, status becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: sensitive
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Statuses are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: spoilerText
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: Mark status and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: visibility
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: Sets the visibility of the posted status to public, unlisted, private, direct.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: scheduledAt
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: UTC Datetime at which to schedule a status.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: inReplyToId
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: ID of the status being replied to, if status is a reply.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: contentType
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: (Pleroma) The MIME type of the status, it is transformed into HTML by the backend. You can get the list of the supported MIME types with the nodeinfo endpoint.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.name: inReplyToConversationId
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html#/s:7T.abstract: (Pleroma) Will reply to a given conversation, addressing only the people who are part of the recipient set of that conversation. Sets the visibility to direct.

Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: id
Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: ID of the scheduled status in the database.

Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: scheduledAt
Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: ID of the status in the database.

Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: params
Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: The parameters to be used when the status is posted

Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: mediaAttachments
Structs/ScheduledStatus.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Media that is attached to this status.

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: requested
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Do you have a pending follow request for this user?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: endorsed
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you featuring this user on your profile?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: mutingNotifications
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you muting notifications from this user?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: showingReblogs
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Are you receiving this user’s boosts in your home timeline?

Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.name: notifying
Structs/Relationship.html#/s:7TootSDK12R.abstract: Have you enabled notifications for this user?

Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.name: follow
Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.abstract: Receive a push notification when someone has followed you? Boolean.

Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.name: favourite
Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.abstract: Receive a push notification when a status you created has been favourited by someone else? Boolean.

Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.name: reblog
Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.abstract: Receive a push notification when a status you created has been boosted by someone else? Boolean.

Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.name: mention
Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.abstract: Receive a push notification when someone else has mentioned you in a status? Boolean.

Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.name: poll
Structs/PushSubscription/Alerts.html#/s:.abstract: Receive a push notification when a poll you voted in or created has ended? Boolean. Added in 2.8.0

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: id
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The id of the push subscription in the database.

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: endpoint
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Where push alerts will be sent to.

Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.name: alerts
Structs/PushSubscription.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Which alerts should be delivered to the endpoint.

Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.name: showAll
Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.abstract: Always show all media by default, regardless of sensitivity

Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.name: hideAll
Structs/Preferences/ExpandMedia.html#/s:.abstract: Always hide all media by default, regardless of sensitivity

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultVisibility
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default visibility for new posts. Equivalent to Source#privacy.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultSensitive
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default sensitivity flag for new posts. Equivalent to Source#sensitive.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: postingDefaultLanguage
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Default language for new posts. Equivalent to Source#language

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: readingExpandMedia
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Whether media attachments should be automatically displayed or blurred/hidden.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.name: readingExpandSpoilers
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:7TootSDK11Pr.abstract: Whether CWs should be expanded by default.

Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.name: title
Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.abstract: The text value of the poll option. String.

Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.name: votesCount
Structs/Poll/Option.html#/s:7TootSDK4Pol.abstract: The number of received votes for this option. Number, or null if results are not published yet.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV2idSS.name: id
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV2idSS.abstract: The ID of the poll in the database.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV11vot.name: votersCount
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV11vot.abstract: How many unique accounts have voted on a multiple-choice poll.

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV5vote.name: voted
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV5vote.abstract: When called with a user token, has the authorized user voted?

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV8ownV.name: ownVotes
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV8ownV.abstract: When called with a user token, which options has the authorized user chosen?

Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV6emoj.name: emojis
Structs/Poll.html#/s:7TootSDK4PollV6emoj.abstract: Custom emoji to be used for rendering poll options.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: id
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The account id of the mentioned user.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: url
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The location of the mentioned user’s profile.

Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.name: acct
Structs/Mention.html#/s:7TootSDK7Mention.abstract: The webfinger acct: URI of the mentioned user.

Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: home
Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Information about the user’s position in the home timeline.

Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.name: notifications
Structs/Marker/Timeline.html#/s:7TootSDK.abstract: Information about the user’s position in their notifications.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV1.name: lastReadId
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV1.abstract: The ID of the most recently viewed entity.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV9.name: updatedAt
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV9.abstract: The timestamp of when the marker was set.

Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV7.name: version
Structs/Marker.html#/s:7TootSDK6MarkerV7.abstract: Used for locking to prevent write conflicts.

Structs/List/RepliesPolicy.html#/s:7Toot.name: list
Structs/List/RepliesPolicy.html#/s:7Toot.abstract: Show replies to members of the list

Structs/List.html#/s:7TootSDK4ListV2idSS.name: id
Structs/List.html#/s:7TootSDK4ListV2idSS.abstract: The internal database ID of the list.

Structs/Instance/Stats.html#/s:7TootSDK8.name: statusCount
Structs/Instance/Stats.html#/s:7TootSDK8.abstract: Statuses authored by users on instance. Number.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: shortDescription
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: A shorter description defined by the admin.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: email
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: An email that may be contacted for any inquiries.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: version
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: The version of the server installed on the instance.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: languages
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: Primary languages of the website and its staff.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: stats
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: Statistics about how much information the instance contains.

Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.name: contactAccount
Structs/Instance.html#/s:7TootSDK8Instan.abstract: A user that can be contacted, as an alternative to email.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: providerUsername
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The account owner’s username on the identity provider’s service.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: profileUrl
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: The account owner’s profile URL on the identity provider.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: proofUrl
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: A link to a statement of identity proof, hosted by the identity provider.

Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.name: updatedAt
Structs/IdentityProof.html#/s:7TootSDK13.abstract: When the identity proof was last updated.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV3ur.name: url
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV3ur.abstract: A link to a static copy of the custom emoji.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV15v.name: visibleInPicker
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV15v.abstract: Whether this Emoji should be visible in the picker or unlisted.

Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV8ca.name: category
Structs/Emoji.html#/s:7TootSDK5EmojiV8ca.abstract: Used for sorting custom emoji in the picker.

Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.name: status
Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: The text content of the status. If media_ids is provided, this becomes optional. Attaching a poll is optional while status is provided.

Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.name: spoilerText
Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Text to be shown as a warning or subject before the actual content. Statuses are generally collapsed behind this field.

Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.name: sensitive
Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Mark status and attached media as sensitive? Defaults to false.

Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.name: mediaIds
Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Include Attachment IDs to be attached as media. If provided, status becomes optional, and poll cannot be used.

Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.name: poll
Structs/EditStatusParams.html#/s:7TootSD.abstract: Poll options. Note that editing a poll’s options will reset the votes.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: expiresIn
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Integer. Duration that the poll should be open, in seconds. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[options] must be provided.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: multiple
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Does the poll allow multiple-choice answers? Defaults to false.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: hideTotals
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Hide vote counts until the poll ends? Defaults to false.

Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.name: options
Structs/CreatePoll.html#/s:7TootSDK10Cre.abstract: Possible answers for the poll. If provided, media_ids cannot be used, and poll[expires_in] must be provided.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: name
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: The emoji used for the reaction. Either a unicode emoji, or a custom emoji’s shortcode.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: count
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: The total number of users who have added this reaction.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: me
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: Whether the authorized user has added this reaction to the announcement.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.name: staticUrl
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html#/s:7To.abstract: A link to a non-animated version of the custom emoji.

Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.name: createdAt
Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.abstract: Whether the announcement has a start/end time.

Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.name: read
Structs/Announcement.html#/s:7TootSDK12A.abstract: Whether the announcement has been read by the user.

Structs/Activity.html.name: Activity
Structs/Activity.html.abstract: Represents a weekly bucket of instance activity.

Structs/Announcement.html.name: Announcement
Structs/Announcement.html.abstract: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.

Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html.name: AnnouncementReaction
Structs/AnnouncementReaction.html.abstract: Represents an emoji reaction to an Announcement.

Structs/CreatePoll.html.name: CreatePoll
Structs/CreatePoll.html.abstract: A request to create a new poll

Structs/List.html.name: List
Structs/List.html.abstract: Represents a list of some users that the authenticated user follows.

Structs/Marker.html.name: Marker
Structs/Marker.html.abstract: Represents the last read position within a user’s timelines.

Structs/Mention.html.name: Mention
Structs/Mention.html.abstract: Represents a mention of a user within the content of a status.

Structs/Poll.html.name: Poll
Structs/Poll.html.abstract: Represents a poll attached to a status.

Structs/PushSubscription.html.name: PushSubscription
Structs/PushSubscription.html.abstract: Represents a subscription to the push streaming server.

Structs/Report.html.name: Report
Structs/Report.html.abstract: Reports filed against users and/or statuses, to be taken action on by moderators.

Structs/ScheduledStatus.html.name: ScheduledStatus
Structs/ScheduledStatus.html.abstract: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.

Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html.name: ScheduledStatusParams
Structs/ScheduledStatusParams.html.abstract: Parameters to post a new scheduled status

Structs/Tag.html.name: Tag
Structs/Tag.html.abstract: Represents a hashtag used within the content of a status.

Structs/TagHistory.html.name: TagHistory
Structs/TagHistory.html.abstract: Represents daily usage history of a hashtag.

Structs/TootApplication.html.name: TootApplication
Structs/TootApplication.html.abstract: Represents an application that interfaces with the REST API to access accounts or post statuses.

Structs/TootField.html.name: TootField
Structs/TootField.html.abstract: Represents a profile field as a name-value pair with optional verification.

Structs/TootNotification.html.name: TootNotification
Structs/TootNotification.html.abstract: Represents a notification of an event relevant to the user.

Structs/TootSource.html.name: TootSource
Structs/TootSource.html.abstract: Represents display or publishing preferences of user’s own account. Returned as an additional entity when verifying and updated credentials, as an attribute of Account.

Protocols/TootStream.html.name: TootStream
Protocols/TootStream.html.abstract: A protocol that all stream types can adopt

Enums/StatusTootStreams.html.name: StatusTootStreams
Enums/StatusTootStreams.html.abstract: A list of stream types which return [Status]

Enums/AccountTootStreams.html.name: AccountTootStreams
Enums/AccountTootStreams.html.abstract: A list of stream types which return Account

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugRequests
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Set this to true to see a print() of outgoing requests.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugResponses
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Set this to true to see a print() of request response.

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: debugOn()
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Prints extra debug details like outgoing requests and responses

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: scheduleStatus(_:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Schedules a status based on the components provided

Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.name: getScheduledStatus(id:)
Classes/TootClient.html#/s:7TootSDK0A6Cl.abstract: Gets a single Scheduled Status by id

Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.name: public
Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Visible to everyone, shown in public timelines.

Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.name: unlisted
Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Visible to public, but not included in public timelines.

Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.name: private
Classes/Status/Visibility.html#/s:7TootS.abstract: Visible to followers only, and to any mentioned users.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC2.name: id
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC2.abstract: ID of the status in the database.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC3.name: uri
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC3.abstract: URI of the status used for federation.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC9.name: createdAt
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC9.abstract: The date when this status was created.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC9.name: sensitive
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC9.abstract: Is this status marked as sensitive content?

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: spoilerText
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: Subject or summary line, below which status content is collapsed until expanded.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: mediaAttachments
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: Media that is attached to this status.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: application
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: The application used to post this status.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC8.name: mentions
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC8.abstract: Mentions of users within the status content.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC6.name: emojis
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC6.abstract: Custom emoji to be used when rendering status content.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: reblogsCount
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: How many boosts this status has received.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: favouritesCount
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: How many favourites this status has received.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: repliesCount
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: How many replies this status has received.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC3.name: url
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC3.abstract: A link to the status’s HTML representation.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.name: inReplyToAccountId
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC1.abstract: ID of the account being replied to.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC4.name: card
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC4.abstract: Preview card for links included within status content.

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC4.name: text
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC4.abstract: Plain-text source of a status. Returned instead of content when status is deleted so the user

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC5.name: muted
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC5.abstract: Have you muted notifications for this status’s conversation?

Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC6.name: pinned
Classes/Status.html#/s:7TootSDK6StatusC6.abstract: Have you pinned this status? Only appears if the status is pinnable.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: id
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The account id header

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: username
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The username of the account, not including domain.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: acct
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The Webfinger account URI

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: url
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The location of the user’s profile page

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: displayName
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The profile’s display name.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: note
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The profile’s bio / description

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: avatar
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: avatarStatic
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A static version of the avatar.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: header
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: headerStatic
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A static version of the header

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: locked
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Whether the account manually approves follow requests

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: emojis
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile. If none, an empty array will be returned

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: discoverable
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: createdAt
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: When the account was created

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: lastStatusAt
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: When the most recent status was posted

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: statusesCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: How many statuses are attached to this account

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: followersCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The reported followers of this profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: followingCount
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The reported follows of this profile

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: moved
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: suspended
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: limited
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behing a warning screen.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: fields
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: Additional metadata attached to a profile as name-value pairs

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: bot
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: A presentational flag.

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: source
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: An extra entity to be used with API methods to verify credentials and update credentials

Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.name: tootRichDisplayName
Classes/Account.html#/s:7TootSDK7Account.abstract: The profile’s display name including html markup for embedded emojis

Classes/Account.html.name: Account
Classes/Account.html.abstract: Represents a user and their associated profile.

Classes/Status.html.name: Status
Classes/Status.html.abstract: Represents a status posted by an account.
